Author: WinonaQuimby
Text: Are you familiar with carb refeeding days? Doing this once a week might help your energy levels a lot. I know it worked well for me during my most intensive restrictive phases.  Of course, with an ED, something like a refeed day is much easier said than done, but unfortunately I don't think there's much you can do for your fatigue that doesn't involve at least *some* increase in calorie intake.
